desc: Show built-in defaults for various tar options
Print program version and copyright information
Check device numbers when creating incremental archives
Use  METHOD  to detect holes in sparse files
Do not exit with nonzero on unreadable files
Set  dump  level  for  a created listed-incremental archive
Do not check device numbers when creating incremental archives
Assume the archive is not seekable
Process only the Nth occurrence of each file in the archive
Disable the use of some potentially harmful options
Set which version  of  the  sparse  format  to  use
Don't replace existing files that are newer
Recursively remove all files in the directory prior to extracting it
Remove files after adding to archive
Don't replace existing files when extracting
Remove each file prior to extracting over it
Treat non-zero exit codes of children as error
Force  NAME  as  group for added files
Read group translation map from FILE
Force symbolic mode CHANGES for added files
Cancel the effect of the prior --delay-directory-restore
Apply the user's umask when extracting
Always use numbers for user/group names
Force NAME as owner for added files
Read owner translation map from FILE
Try  extracting  files with the same ownership
sort directory entries according to ORDER
Specify the exclude pattern for xattr keys
Specify the include pattern for xattr keys
Archive file is local even if it has a colon
Run script at end of tape
keep track of which volume of a multi-volume archive it is working in FILE
Preserve all permissions and do not sort file arguments
Exclude files listed in specified file
Use archive suffix to determine the compression program
Do not use archive suffix to determine the compression program
